text:
Nnamdi Asomugha net worth and salary: Nnamdi Asomugha is an American professional football player who has a net worth of $35 million dollars. Nnamdi Asomugha was born in Lafayette, Louisiana, and grew up in Los Angeles, California. He played baseball and football throughout high school, and chose to attend the University of California – Berkeley, where he continued to play football. He graduated from UC – Berkeley with a degree in Corporate Finance, and was drafted by the Oakland Raiders in 2003. He went relatively unused during his first two seasons with the team, but he broke out in 2005. He played exceptionally well for the Raiders through 2010, regularly appearing on lists of the best players in the NFL. He was an All-Pro selection four times while with the Raiders, and a Pro Bowl selection three times. He was Oakland Raiders MVP in 2006 and 2008. Unfortunately, since choosing to leave the team, he has struggled. He played two unsuccessful seasons with the Philadelphia Eagles, and is currently trying to find his footing with the San Francisco 49ers. In July 2012, Nnamdi Asomugha announced his engagement to actress Kerry Washington, the couple were married in 2013.

Contracts: Nnamdi Asomugha signed a five year $60 million contract with the Philadelphia Eagles in 2011. The contract came with $25 million of guaranteed money. After 11 seasons in football, Nnamdi announced his retirement from the NFL in late December 2013. During his career, Nnamdi earned $71 million in salary alone.
